      • Controller

        public Controller​(int noWords,
                  int totalWords,
                  WordRecord[] words,
                  Score score)
        This is the constructor for the Controller class.
        Parameters:
        noWords - the total number of falling on the screen
        totalWords - the total words to fall over the entire game
        words - the array of words falling at an instance
        score - This is the score object for the game
